馬術: (ばじゅつ) - horse-riding; horsemanship; equestrian art
馬賊: (ばぞく) - mounted bandit (esp. historically in NE China from the end of the Qing dynasty)
馬蹄螺: (バテイラ) - Omphalius pfeifferi pfeifferi (subspecies of top shell)
馬車馬: (ばしゃうま) - cart-horse/work-horse; (usu. as 馬車馬のように) doing something wholeheartedly/doing with one's undivided attention
馬返し: (うまがえし) - point along a (mountain) pass beyond which a horse cannot travel
馬追い: (うまおい) - loading a horse with passengers or baggage; driving a horse into a pen; Hexacentrus japonicus (species of katydid)/Hexacentrus unicolor (species of katydid)
馬追虫: (うまおいむし) - Hexacentrus japonicus (species of katydid); Hexacentrus unicolor (species of katydid)
馬連: (ばれん) - disk-shaped pad for pressing paper when making a print from a wood block; rubbing pad; baren
馬道: (うまみち) - (めんどう is also written with the ateji 面道)  long roofed passageway (originally having an earthen floor and used as a bridle path)
馬鈴薯澱粉: (ばれいしょでんぷん) - potato starch
馬鎧: (うまよろい) - horse armor; horse armour
馬面: (うまがお) - long thin face; (うまづら only)  Black Scraper (fish)
馬面剥: (うまづらはぎ) - black scraper fish (Novodon modestus)
馬面蝙蝠: (ウマヅラコウモリ) - epauletted fruit bat (Epomophorus spp.)
馬頭琴: (ばとうきん) - morin khuur (stringed musical instrument of Mongolian origin); matouqin
馬頭観音: (ばとうかんのん) - Hayagriva (manifestation of Avalokitesvara with an ornament in the shape of a horse's head)
馬鹿: (baka) - tolo, idiota; coisa trivial, tolice, absurdo; tolo, idiota; coisa trivial, tolice, absurdo; tolo, estúpido, lento, absurdo, ridículo
馬鹿が移る: (ばかがうつる) - to catch 'the stupid' (e.g. from talking to stupid people, watching mindless TV, etc.)
馬鹿さ加減: (ばかさかげん) - extent of (one's) foolishness; degree of stupidity
馬鹿でかい: (ばかでかい) - enormous; gargantuan; immense; ridiculously large
馬鹿でもチョンでも: (ばかでもチョンでも) - (チョン is often a racist term for Koreans)  easy; simple; even if you're an idiot or a simpleton
馬鹿と鋏は使い様: (ばかとはさみはつかいよう) - Everything comes in handy when rightly used
馬鹿なことをする: (ばかなことをする) - to do a silly thing
馬鹿な事をする: (ばかなことをする) - to do a silly thing
馬鹿な事を為る: (ばかなことをする) - to do a silly thing
馬鹿にする: (ばかにする) - to make fun of; to look down on; to make light of
馬鹿にならない: (バカにならない) - something not insignificant; not to be sneezed at
馬鹿に付ける薬は無い: (ばかにつけるくすりはない) - A born fool is never cured
馬鹿に出来ない: (ばかにできない) - someone (something) not to be trifled with
馬鹿の一つ覚え: (ばかのひとつおぼえ) - He that knows little often repeats it
馬鹿の壁: (ばかのかべ) - phenomenon that perfect reasoning fail if an idiot cannot understand
馬鹿は死ななきゃ治らない: (ばかはしななきゃなおらない) - once a fool, always a fool
馬鹿ばやし: (ばかばやし) - orchestra present at Japanese festival; festival music (may be sung from a festival float)
馬鹿も一芸: (ばかもいちげい) - even a fool has one talent
馬鹿も休み休み言え: (ばかもやすみやすみいえ) - stop talking nonsense; don't be ridiculous; give me a break
馬鹿を見る: (ばかをみる) - to feel like an idiot; to make a fool of yourself
馬鹿チョンカメラ: (バカチョンカメラ) - (note that チョン is often a racist term for Koreans)  automatic camera
馬鹿丁寧: (ばかていねい) - (yoji) overly polite; excessively polite; polite to a fault
馬鹿力: (ばかぢから) - great physical power; animal strength
馬鹿受け: (ばかうけ) - ridiculously good reception; being extremely well-received
馬鹿囃子: (ばかばやし) - orchestra present at Japanese festival; festival music (may be sung from a festival float)
馬鹿女: (ばかじょ) - stupid girl; stupid woman
馬鹿律儀: (ばかりちぎ) - (yoji) honest and straightforward to a fault
馬鹿慇懃: (ばかいんぎん) - (yoji) overdone politeness; polite to a fault; feigned politeness
馬鹿松茸: (バカマツタケ) - Tricholoma bakamatsutake (mushroom); false matsutake
馬鹿正直: (ばかしょうじき) - (yoji) honest to a fault; foolishly honest; naively honest
馬鹿穴: (ばかあな) - clearance hole (hole for a bolt, screw, etc., which is large enough to allow the thread, etc. to pass through)
馬鹿笑い: (ばかわらい) - horse laugh; guffaw; wild laughter
馬鹿者: (ばかもの) - moron; idiot; stupid person
馬鹿貝: (バカガイ) - Mactra chinensis (species of trough shell)
馬鹿面: (ばかづら) - foolish face; stupid look on one's face
馬鹿馬鹿しい: (bakabakashii) - absurdo, ridículo, bobo, risível, sem sentido, estúpido, tolo
馬鹿高い: (ばかだかい) - ridiculously expensive; stupidly expensive
馬齢: (ばれい) - humble term for refer to one's own age
馬齢を重ねる: (ばれいをかさねる) - to have aged without having accomplished anything
馭する: (ぎょする) - to drive (e.g. horse, carriage); (御する only) to control/to manage
馭者: (ぎょしゃ) - coachman; driver; cabman; postilion
馳せる: (はせる) - to run/to hurry (when going somewhere); to drive (a car) quickly/to ride fast (on a horse); to win (fame)
馳せ参じる: (はせさんじる) - to hasten to join; to hurry to visit
